subject: an assert for testing a ResultSet
msgSnippet: I have a lot of tests that need to assert that data was inserted in our database.  Does anyone have a better way than to get a ResultSet and loop through with
messageBody:
I have a lot of tests that need to assert that data was inserted in our
database. Does anyone have a better way than to get a ResultSet and loop
through with a bunch of assert statements?

I thought it might be cool to have an assert that lets you pass a resultset,
a number of expected records, and a two-dimensional array of expected values
(if it could handle the data types correctly)...any other thoughts?

thanks,

jason
